name: Besnatched
description:
"I think you're gonna love Besnatched"
The Daily App Show

"It is a cool game!"
Mike Vallez - CrazyMikesApps.com

"Besnatched is a very cool puzzle game that puts a twist on typical matching games.
BUY IT"
Jessica's Appinion - GameZone.com

"Besnatched is a fun game and very professionally done. If you are a bejeweled fan you may want to give this one a try as well."
Appdigity.com

********************************************************

The world's first 'Snatch 3' game!

100 Levels to test you.
300 Stars to win.
75+ Achievements to collect.

Make Streaks, Combos, Chains, Doubles, Trebles and much more as you swap, flick and toss your way through each exciting level.

Battle the skulls and other hazards who will try to stop you reaching your goal. Use special tiles and snatches to find the best solution to each level.

Super smooth gameplay,
Beautiful graphics,
Great sound and music,
Responsive and unique control,
Incredibly fun and addictive,
Showcase your achievements using email & your facebook wall in-game.

Get Besnatched today!

Special introductory price!
